TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit InputManager extends System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject
Public NotInheritable Class InputManager Inherits DispatcherObject

summary.span: 管理 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 中的所有输入系统。

span.span: Manages all the input systems in Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类负责协调中的所有输入系统 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 。The class is responsible for coordinating all of the input systems in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. 筛选器是侦听或的任何代码 。A filter is any code that listens to or . 筛选器可以修改输入暂存区域。Filters can modify the input staging area. 监视器是侦听或的任何代码 。A monitor is any code that listens to or . 监视器无法修改输入暂存区域。Monitors cannot modify the input staging area. 控制输入临时区域。The controls the input staging area. 输入临时区域处理到事件中的输入 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 。The input staging area processes input into [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] events. 输入在以下阶段的中进行处理 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] ：Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages: 1. 预处理阶段。Pre-process stage. 输入管理器引发 事件。The input manager raises the event. 2. 预先通知阶段。Pre-notify stage. 输入管理器引发 事件。The input manager raises the event. 3. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]引发输入事件。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised. 4. 通知后阶段。Post-notify stage. 输入管理器引发 事件。The input manager raises the event. 5. 后处理阶段。Post-process stage. 输入管理器引发 事件。The input manager raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类将在 Internet 区域中不可用。This class will not be available in Internet zone.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event EnterMenuMode As EventHandler

summary.span: 当控件通过调用 方法进入菜单模式时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a control enters menu mode by calling the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 组件向此事件注册委托，以响应进入输入管理器的菜单模式的控件。Components register delegates with this event to respond to a control entering the input manager's menu mode.

summary.span: 命中测试的结果可能已更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the result of a hit-test may have changed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsInMenuMode As Boolean
public: property bool IsInMenuMode { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示此 是否处于菜单模式。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether this is in menu mode.

value.span: 如果此 处于菜单模式，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this is in menu mode; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `true` 如果任何菜单打开，则属性将返回， `false` 如果没有打开的菜单，则返回。The property returns `true` if any menus are open, and it returns `false` if no menus are open.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event LeaveMenuMode As EventHandler

summary.span: 当控件通过调用 方法退出菜单模式时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a control leaves menu mode by calling the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 组件向此事件注册委托，以响应离开输入管理器菜单模式的控件。Components register delegates with this event to respond to a control leaving the input manager's menu mode.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void PopMenuMode(class System.Windows.PresentationSource menuSite) cil managed

span.span: The menu to leave.

summary.span: 由组件调用以退出菜单模式。

span.span: Called by components to leave menu mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 组件调用此方法以退出输入管理器的菜单模式。A component calls this method to leave the input manager's menu mode. `menuSite`释放对窗口消息的特权访问。The `menuSite` releases privileged access to window messages. `false` 如果这是要关闭的最后一个菜单，则调用此方法会导致打开的菜单的内部计数减少，并将属性设置为。Calling this method causes the internal count of open menus to decrement and sets the property to `false`, if this is the last menu to close.

summary.span: 处理程序处理完输入且已引发相应的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 事件后发生。

span.span: Occurs after the handlers have finished processing the input and the corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] events have been raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 监视器是侦听或的任何代码 。A monitor is any code that listens to or . 监视器无法修改输入暂存区域。Monitors cannot modify the input staging area. 附加到的处理程序 将按相反的顺序进行调用，以便在系统中的处理程序之前调用用户添加的处理程序。The handlers attached to are invoked in reverse order so that handlers added by the users are invoked before handlers in the system. 输入在以下阶段的中进行处理 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] ：Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages: 1. 预处理阶段。Pre-process stage. 输入管理器引发 事件。The input manager raises the event. 2. 预先通知阶段。Pre-notify stage. 输入管理器引发 事件。The input manager raises the event. 3. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]引发输入事件。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised. 4. 通知后阶段。Post-notify stage. 输入管理器引发 事件。The input manager raises the event. 5. 后处理阶段。Post-process stage. 输入管理器引发 事件。The input manager raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 筛选器是侦听或的任何代码 。A filter is any code that listens to or . 筛选器可以修改输入暂存区域。Filters can modify the input staging area. 附加到的处理程序 将按相反的顺序进行调用，以便在系统中的处理程序之前调用用户添加的处理程序。The handlers attached to are invoked in reverse order so that handlers added by the users are invoked before handlers in the system. 对 传递给的调用 将取消对输入的处理。Calling on the passed to the will cancel the processing of the input. 输入在以下阶段的中进行处理 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] ：Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages: 1. 预处理阶段。Pre-process stage. 输入管理器引发 事件。The input manager raises the event. 2. 预先通知阶段。Pre-notify stage. 输入管理器引发 事件。The input manager raises the event. 3. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]引发输入事件。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised. 4. 通知后阶段。Post-notify stage. 输入管理器引发 事件。The input manager raises the event. 5. 后处理阶段。Post-process stage. 输入管理器引发 事件。The input manager raises the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool ProcessInput(class System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs input) cil managed
Public Function ProcessInput (input As InputEventArgs) As Boolean

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Security.SecurityCritical]
[<System.Security.SecurityCritical>]

span.span: The input to process.
Processes the specified input synchronously.

returns.span: 如果已处理所有输入事件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if all input events were handled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 筛选器是侦听或的任何代码 。A filter is any code that listens to or . 筛选器可以修改输入暂存区域。Filters can modify the input staging area. 监视器是侦听或的任何代码 。A monitor is any code that listens to or . 监视器无法修改输入暂存区域。Monitors cannot modify the input staging area. 指定的输入由所有筛选器和监视器处理，并最终作为输入事件调度到相应的元素。The specified input is processed by all the filters and monitors and is finally dispatched to the appropriate element as an input event. 输入在以下阶段的中进行处理 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] ：Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages: 1. 预处理阶段。Pre-process stage. 输入管理器引发 事件。The input manager raises the event. 2. 预先通知阶段。Pre-notify stage. 输入管理器引发 事件。The input manager raises the event. 3. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]引发输入事件。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised. 4. 通知后阶段。Post-notify stage. 输入管理器引发 事件。The input manager raises the event. 5. 后处理阶段。Post-process stage. 输入管理器引发 事件。The input manager raises the event.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void PushMenuMode(class System.Windows.PresentationSource menuSite) cil managed

span.span: The menu to enter.

summary.span: 由组件调用以进入菜单模式。

span.span: Called by components to enter menu mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 组件调用此方法以进入输入管理器的菜单模式。A component calls this method to enter the input manager's menu mode. `menuSite`获取对窗口消息的特权访问。The `menuSite` gets privileged access to window messages. `true` 如果这是第一个打开的菜单，则调用此方法会导致打开的菜单的内部计数递增，并将属性设置为。Calling this method causes the internal count of open menus to increment and sets the property to `true`, if this is the first menu to open.

span.span: is .
